amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the State Department's account for nonproliferation, anti-terrorism, demining and related programs by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) by $5 million for the State Department's program of nonproliferation, anti-terrorism, demining and related programs and activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
